Name: BRINK Traveler
About the game: Important note: Oculus, Index, G2 and HTC Vive users: make sure SteamVR is your active OpenXR runtime in SteamVR > Settings > Developer Vive Cosmos users: make sure to launch Viveport Console and select Yes when asked about OpenXR. -------------------------------------- BRINK Traveler is a virtual travel experience that takes you to amazing natural locations in full 3D to feel like you're really there. Step into a postcard and visit some of the most breathtaking places on Earth today! Featuring: 20 incredible spots to see across 13 locations A virtual guide to teach you about your surroundings Collect points of interest Shoot photos Download only the locations you wish to see Regular content updates with more locations to come Current locations: Horseshoe Bend, White Pocket, Mount Morrison, Mount Whitney, Alabama Hills, The Wave, Arches National Park, Death Valley National Park (North & South), Antelope Canyon, Crystal Crag, Haifoss Iceland, and more locations coming soon . BRINK XR is a proud member of 1% for the Planet . We donate a minimum of 1% of our total annual sales to organizations focused on environmental protection initiatives to ensure the wonderful natural places of the World are preserved for future generations.
